function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for virus transmission through ventilation systems and building materials","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases within the built environment","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of ventilation systems, use of antimicrobial building materials, and implementation of effective filtration systems","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, antimicrobial coatings, and natural ventilation designs","People":"Building occupants, construction workers, and maintenance staff","Owner":"Building developers and owners"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in quantifying the impact of new strategies and technologies on the economy, social goals, and environmental goals","Impact":"Risk of investing in ineffective or harmful strategies and technologies","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough evidence-based research and pilot testing before large-scale implementation of new strategies and technologies","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, economic impact assessment models, and social and environmental impact assessment frameworks","People":"Researchers, policymakers, and investors","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, and private sector organizations"},{"Description":"Risk of prolonged indoor exposure leading to reduced physical and mental health","Impact":"Decreased physical health, increased stress, and decreased productivity","Mitigation":"Incorporation of biophilic design principles, promotion of physical activity, and provision of mental health support services","Technologies":"Biophilic design elements, indoor green spaces, and wellness technology applications","People":"Building occupants and remote workers","Owner":"Architects, employers, and building managers"}]}
